oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dyer CDV Album
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lt. Col. Calvin M. Dyer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Album of 23 Civil War cartes de visite (CDVs) with Index to Portraits. The album belonged to Lt. Col. Calvin M. Dyer (whose picture was removed before the album was received). The men were in the 1st Tennessee Volunteer Cavalry Regiment in the Union Army, also called the 1st East Tennessee Cavalry Regiment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cartes de visite; Portraits; Military personnel; Military uniforms; Civil wars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
INDEX TO PORTRAITS
1. Capt. Elbert J. Cannon 2. Lt. Col. Calvin M. Dyer (photograph removed from album) 3. Lt. John Roberts 4. Lt. John N. Hariss [Harris?] 5. Capt. Jacob K. Lones 6. Lt. James H. Smith 7. Sargt Martin L. Peters 8. Sargt James B. Clapp 9. Corpl Nathan A. York 10. Corpl Henry C. Parham 11. William Davault [Devault?] 12. Franklin Monday 13. Wm. Campbell and Ed Mitchel [Mitchell?] 14. Ephream L. Kirk [Ephraim?] 15. Philip M. McLannahan [McClannahan?] 16. John Tharp 17. Calvin M. Butler 18. Jiles J. Whithed [Giles? Whitehead?] 19. Chesley Skeen 20. Rufus E. Carson 21. Lt. Andrew J. Gahagan 22. Sargt James Lee 23. Drury A. Brooks 24. Lt. Isaac B. Self
